arts.ttl: Pereira 'too tired' for a pint as Wolves secure safety
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira, who celebrated last week's 4-2 win over Tottenham in a Wolverhampton pub, says he's "too tired" for a pint this week after his side secure Premier League safety with a 1-0 win against Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Pablo Sarabia free-kick stuns Man Utd as Wolves seal historic league double
arts.sum: Wolves’ fourth away league win on the trot represented United’s 15th league loss of the campaign.

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer brings Ruben Amorim back down to earth with brutal Man Utd assessment
arts.sum: Alan Shearer is not convinced Manchester United can improve their Premier League form even with the momentum they might have from their Europa League progression

arts.ttl: Player facing miserable summer after failed Wolves move – Not wanted, agents given warning
arts.sum: Although Ajax are almost certain to return to the Champions League, the club is still facing major financial issues – and this could reportedly impact one Wolverhampton Wanderers player. arts.ttl: Wolfsburg rekindle interest in Wolves striker Fabio Silva
arts.sum: Sky Germany's Florian Plettenberg reports that VfL Wolfsburg are also interested in Wolverhampton Wanderers striker Fabio Silva.

arts.ttl: Wolves boss Vitor Pereira has ruled out move for player – Big transfer claim pushed back down
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers are not interested in defender Milan Skriniar, despite reports to the contrary. That’s according to journalist Reşat Can Özbudak, who reports that Wolves manager Vitor Pereira has ruled out any ‘special requests’ for the player.
